featured.text: In the 8th century, Persian merchants built settlements here, which grew over the next four centuries into their trading posts.
Most of the earliest merchants came from Africa.

definition.zh_def: 商人；從事商品買賣的人。
definition.en_def: A person or company involved in wholesale trade, especially one dealing with foreign countries.
definition.example: The merchant sold exotic spices from distant lands.
